alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 2:03PM MST until February 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM SATURDAY TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts in the Pine Valley Mountains, Brian Head, Long Valley Junction and high elevations of Zion National Park. In the main canyon of Zion National Park and near the visitor center, 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Zion National Park and Southern Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM Saturday to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. For those planning outdoor activities, plan on wintry conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
